description: The relative url that the data was scraped from (add the prefix https://www.fantasypros.com/ to visit the page)
Two word identifier separated by a dash identifying the type of fantasy ranking (best = bestball; dynasty; redraft) and what position it applies to
A two letter identifier combining the ranking type (b = bestball; d = dynasty; r = redraft) and position type (o = overall; p = positional; sf = superflex; rk = rookie)
Player name
FantasyPros ID
Position as tracked by FP
NFL team the player plays for
ID - also known as sportradar_id (they are equivalent!)
base URL for this player on fantasypros.com
Yahoo ID
CBS ID
An image of the player
An square image of the player
Player name after being cleaned by dp_cleannames - generally strips punctuation and suffixes as well as performing common name substitutions.
Team ID as used on MyFantasyLeague.com
Date this dataframe was last updated
Average (mean) expert ranking for this player
Standard deviation of expert rankings for this player
The highest ranking given for this player by any one expert
The lowest ranking given for this player by any one expert
The average percentage this player is rostered across ESPN and Yahoo
The percentage that this player is rostered in ESPN leagues
The percentage that this player is rostered in Yahoo leagues
Change in ranks over a recent period
NFL bye week
